reviews.review: Every one says this is a outdated gamed that changed the gaming landscape when it first came out. but I say this is a better game than most modern shooters, and will always be better. not only did it do it first it also did it best!

Game is incredibly old, graphics are far out of date, and the sound quality hasn't aged well. Despite all this the game is fantastic and very fun. The weapon sandbox is diverse, the options for how to tackle a situation are limitless, and the story is still excellent.
cmon it's half life no explanation needed

You know, at first i didn't like it, but after beating it for the first time i can say i really enjoyed it. Great gunplay, level design, sound design and atmosphere, but i really don't like the slippery movement or bullet sponge enemies. The slippery movement makes the platforming sections frustrating, and  a human soldier should not be able to take 3 shotgun shots to the face and survive. The graphics are also very outdated, but i can see how they were good for their time. Overall when it came out it was revolutionary, but now it's just ok. I reccommend the remake black mesa over this, but whenever half-life 1 is on sale i also reccommend buying the whole anthology, and see for yourself if you like it.
Le jeu est plus vieux que moi lol

una maravilla.

Pace of the game is way too slow, and checkpoints are sparse. If you decide to play this game, make lots of saves. Enemies are overpowered as all hell, and there are no hints for puzzles that you struggle with. Walkthroughs are 100% necessary. While the story of this game is great, it's just BORING being reset and having to do 20 min worth of work over again, which is a problem present throughout the whole game. I suggest you only buy this game if you plan on playing Half Life 2 and Alyx, otherwise stay away. I just didn't have much fun.
Excelente. Más allá de los años, sigue siendo un histórico sin igual. Me encantaba jugarlo de pequeño. Hoy día, es la primera vez que hago modo historia y me está encantando. Recomendado.

came in expecting a mess from the 90s and got a mess from the 90s but actually it was kind of fun. If you play this game, you will experience bugs and shit and an actual dogshit looking game (seriously the graphics are so fugly), but in terms of content, this game has more to offer than a lot of the bullshit they put out these days. similar in feel to bioshock, very atmospheric and cool, with actual thoughtful areas and encounters. def not as good as bioshock tho, play that instead if you havent already

远超我想象的好玩。甚至横向对比重返德军总部也明显优于后者。就算和光环一代相比，我也觉得更胜一筹。地图的设计很精巧，刚好在既有趣又不至于彻底迷路的边界。武器的种类也比较丰富，缺点是那几样高科技武器的击杀效果太一般。游戏里的解谜比较优秀，很多地方没有提示，全靠自己摸索，但也不至于让人摸不着头脑。
这种游戏和《使命召唤》的区别也许就在于，使命召唤是在试图还原战场，而《半条命》并没有这些条条框框，很多场景非常不符合常理，根本不可能出现在现实中，比如悬崖上摇摇欲坠的栈道，还有能把开启人自己扇下去的风扇，现实中这些是非常失败的设计，但是在游戏里却颇有趣味。
me encanta la jugabilidad de este shooter con historia en tiempo real
